title: Responsive Design
text: Modern layouts for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

title: Security
text: Login, logout, and protect sensitive routes with token based authentication systems.

title: Reactive Forms
text: Give users custom feedback in real-time so they know the right way to fill out your forms.

title: Admin Panel
text: Manage your website's content and users, and access vital statistics and logs.

title: Blogging
text: Create, read, update, and delete posts with your own custom tailored blogging system.

title: Social Media
text: Let your users generate their own content, interact on forums, and manage their own profiles.

title: E-Commerce
text: Run your business online with paypal integration.
